arts.ttl: Fulham's ex-Arsenal duo hand Newcastle first loss of the season
arts.sum: Fulham ended Newcastle United ’s unbeaten start to the Premier League season and recorded their second victory of the campaign, winning 3-1 at Craven Cottage thanks to two goals from their summer signings from Arsenal . Fulham have shown a lack of ruthlessness at times this season, but Smith Rowe managed to double their advantage in the first half to get that crucial second goal.

arts.ttl: Tonali Man City role and Gordon concern as Newcastle's luck runs out
arts.sum: Eddie Howe's side were second best for the majority of the game at Craven Cottage and were always chasing the match once Raul Jimenez and Emile Smith-Rowe had given Fulham a 2-0 half-time lead. The Italian was again left on the bench, with his only start so far coming against Nottingham Forest in the Carabao Cup. Tonali was brought on with 20 minutes to play, barely enough time to influence the game, with Joe Willock starting and Jacob Murphy his half-time replacement.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United player ratings as horror show sees 3s and 4s but Harvey Barnes offers hope
arts.sum: A sloppy start left Eddie Howe's team with a mountain to climb which they could not overcome at 2-0 down and while they gave it a go, Fulham scored a third goal that gave them a scoreline which was reflective of the afternoon overall. After a day which had started with talk of going top, Newcastle slip down three places but there is plenty of football left to be played.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva delighted with Raul Jimenez as Fulham beat Newcastle
arts.sum: Jimenez’s opener marked his second Premier League goal in as many matches.

arts.ttl: Bruno Guimaraes' apologises to fans as TV focuses on unimpressed Paul Mitchell in Newcastle defeat
arts.sum: But despite Harvey Barnes pulling a goal back an injury time blooper from Bruno Guimaraes handed Fulham three points and inflicted Newcastle's first defeat in the Premier League since April. Newcastle tried to rally after the half-hour mark with Harvey Barnes drilling a low shot at goal but Fulham came at the Magpies again.

arts.ttl: On-song Fulham inflict first loss of season on Newcastle
arts.sum: Newcastle United missed out on the chance to go top of the Premier League as their unbeaten start to the season came to an end with a 3-1 loss at Fulham.

arts.ttl: Fulham 3-1 Newcastle United: Highlights, man of the match, stats
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Saturday's Premier League clash between Fulham and Newcastle United.

arts.ttl: Fulham impress to end Newcastle’s unbeaten Premier League start
arts.sum: Raul Jimenez, Emile Smith Rowe and Reiss Nelson sealed victory at Craven Cottage.
Fulham v Newcastle. The post Fulham end Newcastle’s unbeaten run appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United board sent transfer message after Liverpool's failed pursuit of Anthony Gordon
arts.sum: Newcastle United have entered a controversial new competition that will see the Magpies involved in a fiercely contested local derby. Talking about the importance of getting a lucrative deal done for both Gordon and Alexander Isak, Howe said: "You don’t want the transfer speculation or the contracts potentially running into shorter terms because I think that it distracts and rarely benefits the player or the club.
